I really think we should go with this way in the title of our posts. 
It would make it all easier for everyone, and those who wanted to do 
only the posts where their chars are concerned could do it much more 
easily. That was my moderator speech, now let's all go on with our 
lives.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> ::Puts hands together, slight bow a la Jack Sparrow::: 
> 
> Much appreciated. I'm in 50 lists, over half of those are RPGs... 
so... makes 
> it difficult for me to... check 100+ emails a day when I don't 
have much time 
> as it is. I prefer to have a life than just online. Thank you. :) 
> 
> My other issue... I've mentioned this to Airly... about in the 
subject 
> heading.. putting the title of the "scene" then in (( ))  put the 
character that is 
> posting followed by an ATTN then the characters that are to read & 
respond to 
> a certain post.
> I've learned this from a couple other RPGs in which has made 
RPGing MUCH 
> easier... defered from wrong posting, blitz posted, etc. Keeping 
the story at a 
> steady enough pace & a VERY good storyline too. 
> Maybe we can adopt this? Would be SOOOO much easier especially on 
someone who 
> doesn't particularly want to read TONS of email that does not 
pertain to them 
> since reading something I really don't need to know can confuse. 
> 
> 
> Much appreciated, :: again bows a la Jack Sparrow:: 
> Stac
> ~Maxima
